about_the_game:
*Images are from an in-development game build.

Exciting card battles based on classic Japanese hanafuda!

Hanafuda is a classic Japanese card game that pits 2, 3, or 4 players against each other in 1v1 duels or 3-4 player battles. Use the cards you're dealt to form sets and try to get the highest score!

In Holo's Hanafuda, you can play offline against the CPU, or online with friends or in random matches. The choice is yours!

Battle it out using hololive character-themed hanafuda cards!

In Holo's Hanafuda, you can play all the hanafuda classics you know and love, but this time with a deck of hololive-themed hanafuda cards! In addition to Koi-Koi, Oicho-Kabu, and Flower Awase, you can also try out a brand-new original game mode: Holo Awase!

Try out a brand-new hanafuda game: Holo Awase!

In this fresh take on classic hanafuda rules, you can earn points by matching hololive character cards to create hololive sets. Not only that, but each hololive talent has their own unique and powerful Talent Skill, too! Grab those sets, unleash those skills, and claim victory!

Tons of additional game modes!

Holo's Hanafuda isn't just about card games—it has a number of unique game modes, too!

- In Adventure Mode, hololive talents will set out on an epic story-based adventure where they (and you!) will need to defeat surprising opponents in hanafuda matches!

- In Bento Mode, you'll team up with hololive talents to make tasty and cute bento box lunches!

All the above and more await you in Holo's Hanafuda!
